posts.title: ArUco Marker Tracking on Jetson Nano
posts.text: ROS node for camera-based detection and following of ArUco markers with GPU acceleration. Includes PID control and speed adaptation based on target distance. Tech: ROS, OpenCV, CUDA, Python HW: Jetson Nano, CSI camera Repository: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL

posts.title: Mobile Robot Perception for Eurobot 2025
posts.text: Perception stack (object detection, mapping, decision signals) for a mobile robot competing at Eurobot France. Focus on robust vision & calibration. Team artifacts: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL

posts.title: 3D Liver Segmentation → Mixed-Reality Planning
posts.text: End-to-end pipeline: preprocessing (NIfTI/DICOM), 3D U-Net / ResU-Net (PyTorch), Dice/SSIM monitoring, and real-time MR visualization for surgeons with correction workflow. Datasets: LiTS2017, IRCAD, Task08 HepaticVessel Tech: PyTorch, MONAI, CUDA, Unity (Meta Quest) Code: https://github.com/Reda-TOUIL

pages.title: About
pages.text: I’m an electronics engineer focused on robotics, embedded systems, and medical image computing (AI for MRI/CT). I like building reliable pipelines end-to-end: sensing, perception, and deployment on embedded hardware. Contact Email: mohamed_reda.touil@g.enp.edu.dz Phone: +213 549 446 315 Location: Boumerdes, Algeria Highlights Robotics, automation, PCB design, embedded systems Python • C/C++/C# • Arduino • LaTeX Linux • ROS • Docker • Perception ML/DL: scikit-learn, Keras/TensorFlow, PyTorch • MONAI/nnU-Net • DICOM/NIfTI Domains: NLP (basics), MRI/CT handling Achievements Data Analyst in Python — ~36 hours of DataCamp coursework (manipulation, visualization, cleaning) Cloud Computing — two 2-hour DataCamp courses (fundamentals) Competitions Algerian Robot Cup • League of Robotics • ALGO-Challenge • Polymaze (participant & jury) • Eurobot Data/AI: Algerian Data Cup (participant) • Synapson (organiser) Associative activities HR member, Vision and Innovation Club (VIC) IT team, IEEE Student Branch — helped organize events LanguagesArabic • French • English

:root { --bg: #ffffff; --fg: #111111; --card: #f7f7f9; --link: #1f6feb; } :root[data-theme="dark"] { --bg: #0f1216; --fg: #e5e7eb; --card: #151a21; --link: #8ab4f8; } html, body { background: var(--bg); color: var(--fg); } /* Exemple d’adaptation Icarus (ajuste selon ton thème) */ .header, .navbar, .card, .article { background: var(--card); } a { color: var(--link); } /* Bouton toggle */ .theme-toggle { margin-left: 12px; padding: 6px 10px; border: 1px solid transparent; border-radius: 999px; background: var(--card); cursor: pointer; line-height: 1; } /* ======= Correction mode nuit pour les blocs blancs ======= */ :root[data-theme="dark"] [class*="count"], :root[data-theme="dark"] .archive-list-count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .category-list-count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .tag-list-count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .tag-cloud .count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .widget .count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .article-tag-list .tag-list-count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .label-count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .label .count, :root[data-theme="dark"] .tag a span, :root[data-theme="dark"] .tag-cloud a span, :root[data-theme="dark"] .category-list a span, :root[data-theme="dark"] .archive-list a span { background-color: #1f1f1f !important; color: #ffffff !important; border: 1px solid #333 !important; border-radius: 4px; box-shadow: none !important; opacity: 1 !important; } /* icône toggle dans la navbar */ .navbar .nav-icon.theme-toggle-btn { padding: 0 0.5rem; } .navbar .nav-icon.theme-toggle-btn i { font-size: 1.1rem; line-height: 1; } /* couleur de l'icône selon le thème */ :root:not([data-theme="dark"]) .theme-toggle-btn i { color: #4b5563; } /* gris navbar clair */ :root[data-theme="dark"] .theme-toggle-btn i { color: #e5e7eb; } /* blanc en dark */ .theme-toggle-btn:hover i { opacity: .85; }

/* ===================== Night Mode (full dark) ===================== */ :root[data-theme="dark"] { --bg: #0b0b0b; /* fond global */ --fg: #e5e5e5; /* texte principal */ --card: #141414; /* cartes / widgets / navbar / footer */ --link: #4ea3ff; /* liens */ --link-hover: #82c4ff; /* hover liens */ } /* Fond global + texte */ :root[data-theme="dark"] html, :root[data-theme="dark"] body { background: var(--bg) !important; color: var(--fg) !important; (function () { const STORAGE_KEY = 'theme'; const prefersDark = window.matchMedia('(prefers-color-scheme: dark)').matches; const saved = localStorage.getItem(STORAGE_KEY); const initial = saved || (prefersDark ? 'dark' : 'light'); function setTheme(t) { document.documentElement.dataset.theme = t; localStorage.setItem(STORAGE_KEY, t); if (btnIcon) { btnIcon.classList.toggle('fa-moon', t === 'dark'); btnIcon.classList.toggle('fa-sun', t !== 'dark'); toggle.setAttribute('aria-label', t === 'dark' ? 'Switch to light mode' : 'Switch to dark mode'); toggle.title = t === 'dark' ? 'Light mode' : 'Dark mode'; } } // Crée un item de navbar avec une icône Font Awesome const toggle = document.createElement('a'); toggle.href = 'javascript:void(0)'; toggle.className = 'navbar-item nav-icon theme-toggle-btn'; toggle.setAttribute('aria-label', 'Toggle theme'); const btnIcon = document.createElement('i'); btnIcon.className = 'fas'; // on ajoutera fa-moon / fa-sun dans setTheme() toggle.appendChild(btnIcon); toggle.addEventListener('click', () => { const next = (document.documentElement.dataset.theme === 'dark') ? 'light' : 'dark'; setTheme(next); }); document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', () => { // Où injecter : à droite des icônes (GitHub / LinkedIn / Search) const right = document.querySelector('.navbar .navbar-end') || document.querySelector('.navbar .navbar-right') || document.querySelector('.navbar-menu .navbar-end') || document.querySelector('.navbar'); // fallback setTheme(initial); if (right) right.appendChild(toggle); else document.body.appendChild(toggle); }); })();
